attributes.action: Being registered disabled and getting no extra help from council housing!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been on the council waiting list since 1997, and everytime i put in a medical form i get told it dont matter that im disabled as they dont no longer do a points system where on medical reasons you would normally get higher on the list? I think this is wrong and why did it change in the 1st place?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
